elements.text:
You and your friends took some pictures together. The next day, you get a notification that they tagged you in a post on social media. You don't like how you look in the picture.

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

texts: I post a photo from a few weeks ago where I really like how I look.
I want to pretend the picture doesn't exist, but decide to put a nice comment instead.
I tell my friend it was a good idea to post a picture of everyone.
I want to ask my friends if they think I look okay, but decide I look fine on my own.
I leave a comment about how embarrassed I am.
